project1.title: K-Mart Ecosystem
project1.description: A complete e-commerce platform including store, blog, admin dashboard, and custom API. Built with modern React tooling and full authentication, data management and UI systems.
project1.story: K-Mart was a client project where I developed a complete ecosystem. I implemented an admin dashboard and a custom API, optimizing performance and scalability. This project taught me how to structure complex systems efficiently.

project2.title: upydate
project2.description: A Python-based scraper designed to cleanly deliver downloads, automating a process that was previously impossible manually at the workshop.
project2.story: Upydate was created to automate repetitive manual download tasks at my workshop. The project improved my Python scraping skills and taught me how to handle errors, logging, and scheduling reliably.

project3.title: JSONtoVCF Converter
project3.description: A tool built for a client to convert Telegram JSON exports into import-ready VCF contact files. Designed for reliability and ease of use.
project3.story: This project was a client request to convert exported Telegram contacts into VCF format. I focused on reliability and creating a tool that was intuitive and could handle edge cases with real-world data.
